/**
 * Main App Component
 * This is the refactored version of the original MedicalLearningApp
 * Now uses separate components and custom hooks for better organization
 */import React,{useState}from'react';// Import our components and hooks
import Header from'./components/Header';import HomeTab from'./components/HomeTab';import ConditionsTab from'./components/ConditionsTab';import QuizTab from'./components/QuizTab';import ConditionDetailModal from'./components/ConditionDetailModal';import UserProgress from'./components/UserProgress';import PathogenExplorer from'./components/PathogenExplorer';import AntibioticExplorer from'./components/AntibioticExplorer';import useResponsive from'./hooks/useResponsive';import useSearch from'./hooks/useSearch';import useQuizProgress from'./hooks/useQuizProgress';import useBookmarks from'./hooks/useBookmarks';import usePathogenData from'./hooks/usePathogenData';import useAntibioticData from'./hooks/useAntibioticData';// Import our data
import medicalConditions from'./data/medicalConditions';import quizQuestions from'./data/quizQuestions';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// State management
const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('home');const[selectedCondition,setSelectedCondition]=useState(null);const[showMobileMenu,setShowMobileMenu]=useState(false);// Use our custom hooks
const isMobile=useResponsive();const quizProgress=useQuizProgress();const bookmarks=useBookmarks();const pathogenData=usePathogenData(medicalConditions);const antibioticData=useAntibioticData(medicalConditions);// Use search hook for conditions
const searchFields=['name','category','commonPathogens','description'];const{searchTerm,setSearchTerm,filteredItems:filteredConditions}=useSearch(medicalConditions,searchFields);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-slate-50 font-sans",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{activeTab:activeTab,setActiveTab:setActiveTab,isMobile:isMobile,showMobileMenu:showMobileMenu,setShowMobileMenu:setShowMobileMenu}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto p-4 md:p-8",children:[activeTab==='home'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeTab,{setActiveTab:setActiveTab}),activeTab==='conditions'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConditionsTab,{filteredConditions:filteredConditions,setSelectedCondition:setSelectedCondition,searchTerm:searchTerm,setSearchTerm:setSearchTerm}),activeTab==='quiz'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizTab,{quizQuestions:quizQuestions,setActiveTab:setActiveTab,quizProgress:quizProgress}),activeTab==='progress'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProgress,{userProgress:quizProgress,bookmarkedConditions:bookmarks.bookmarkedConditions,onViewCondition:setSelectedCondition,onClearProgress:quizProgress.clearHistory}),activeTab==='pathogens'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PathogenExplorer,{pathogenData:pathogenData,onSelectCondition:setSelectedCondition}),activeTab==='antibiotics'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AntibioticExplorer,{antibioticData:antibioticData,onSelectCondition:setSelectedCondition})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConditionDetailModal,{condition:selectedCondition,onClose:()=>setSelectedCondition(null),isBookmarked:selectedCondition?bookmarks.isBookmarked(selectedCondition.name):false,onToggleBookmark:()=>selectedCondition&&bookmarks.toggleBookmark(selectedCondition),allConditions:medicalConditions})]});}export default App;
